objects.text:
• Invigorating luxury fragrance for all genders
• Premium 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size
• Versatile for both day and evening wear
TIME IS TICKING... OFFER ENDS SOON!

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Invigorating Luxury Fragrance for All
product_details.description:
• Premium unisex eau de toilette suitable for all genders
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with luxurious gold cap
• Fresh and invigorating scent profile perfect for daily wear
• Modern and sophisticated packaging ideal for gifting
• Professional-grade fragrance from BELLAVITA's luxury collection
• Versatile scent suitable for both day and evening wear
• Travel-friendly size that meets international flight regulations
• Premium quality EDT concentration for optimal longevity
• Contemporary unisex fragrance that breaks traditional boundaries

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and vibrant promotional design split into two equal halves. The left half has a dark, luxurious gradient background with circular translucent accents, serving as the textual area. Layer `heading` introduces an urgent tone using bold yellow text for emphasis. Below it, layer `product_name` displays the name of the featured fragrance in white, followed by layer `description` outlining product benefits using bullet points. Layer `tagline` uses a teal blue tone to build urgency. The `price` is shown in bold yellow numerals. A rectangular yellow call-to-action button, built with `cta_background` and `cta`, invites users to engage. The right half displays a product image (`product_image`) in full color, supported by minimal decorative yellow lines for dynamic balance. 

**Color Palette**:
- Dark Teal Gradient: #002A3A to #001A24  
- Cyan Gradient: #00B5B5 to #007A7A  
- Highlight Yellow: #FFD700  
- Accent Teal Text: #00B5B5  
- Base White: #FFFFFF  
- Button Text Contrast: #002A3A  

This layout leverages strong contrasting colors, bold typography, and geometric symmetry to convey an energetic and premium appeal.
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant turquoise bottle that conveys freshness and energy. The dominant color is a lively aqua turquoise (#00B7C4), representing cool, clean, and unisex appeal. Accents of metallic gold (#D4AF37) on the cap and text provide a luxurious contrast, adding sophistication. Soft gradations of turquoise create depth, while the gold elements stand out sharply against the blue background, enhancing visibility without overwhelming the design. White text (#FFFFFF) is used sparingly for additional clarity and elegance. For an advertisement banner, a palette featuring turquoise, gold, and white creates a clean, modern, and premium look that complements the product's personality.
